SEARCH
Package com.wordweave.models

Class BlogModel

java.lang.Object
com.wordweave.models.BlogModel
public class BlogModel extends Object
Represents a blog post in the system. Encapsulates blog details including content, author info, categories, and status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    BlogModel(int blogId, String image, String content, String title, Timestamp updatedAt, int authorId, Date publishDate)

    BlogModel(String image, String content, String title, int authorId, Date publishDate)
    Constructor without blogId and updatedAt.

  • Constructor Details

    • BlogModel

      public BlogModel()

    • BlogModel

      public BlogModel(int blogId, String image, String content, String title, Timestamp updatedAt, int authorId, Date publishDate)
      Full constructor with all main blog attributes except categories and author details. Used when loading a complete blog entity from DB.
      Parameters:
      blogId - Unique ID of the blog
      image - Image URL/path
      content - Blog content/body
      title - Blog title
      updatedAt - Timestamp of last update
      authorId - Author's user ID
      publishDate - Date when blog was published

    • BlogModel

      public BlogModel(String image, String content, String title, int authorId, Date publishDate)
      Constructor without blogId and updatedAt. Useful when creating a new blog post before saving to DB (ID and updatedAt assigned later).
      Parameters:
      image - Image URL/path
      content - Blog content
      title - Blog title
      authorId - Author's user ID
      publishDate - Date of publishing
